name: podamShouldHandleImmutablePojosAnnotatedWithPodamConstructor

testSteps.description: When I invoke the factory manufacturing for <span class='step-parameter'>class uk.co.jemos.podam.test.dto.ImmutableNoHierarchicalAnnotatedPojo
Then the Object <span class='step-parameter'>ImmutableNoHierarchicalPojo [intField=-588701340 should not be null
Then the int field should not be zero
Then the calendar object should not be null
Then the Date object should not be null
Then the long[] array should not be null or empty
The long value cannot be zero

title: Podam should handle immutable POJOs annotated with @PodamConstructor
